title: GPS Tracker
metaDesc: Real-time 4G GPS tracking device with geo-fencing and anti-theft features.
fullDescription: Our advanced GPS Tracker provides real-time location tracking with global coverage. It features geo-fencing, speed alerts, and historical route playback. Ideal for fleet management and asset tracking. Built with industrial-grade components to withstand harsh environments.
features: Global 4G LTE/3G/2G coverage ensuring you never lose track of your assets.
Advanced Geo-fencing capabilities with instant SMS/App alerts.
Industrial-grade IP65 waterproof casing for harsh weather conditions.
Remote engine cut-off functionality for theft prevention.
9-36V wide voltage input making it compatible with motorcycles, cars, and trucks.
packaging: Industrial grade box containing: 1x GPS Unit, 1x Power Cable (4-pin), 1x User Manual, 1x 3M Sticker, 1x Relay (Optional).
